summary: Safety is a crucial aspect of workplace culture, emphasizing the importance of creating a secure environment for employees. It encompasses physical, emotional, and psychological well-being, allowing team members to take risks, experiment, and grow without fear. In the context of Play To Work, safety is integrated into a playful approach to work, encouraging fearless experimentation and collaborative support. This fosters an atmosphere where innovation thrives, and employees feel comfortable breaking and rebuilding ideas, ultimately leading to continuous improvement and achievement.
excerpt: Play To Work transforms your job into an engaging adventure. Start by defining your purpose, then create a playful environment. Experiment fearlessly, breaking and rebuilding ideas. Track progress like a game, keeping score to boost motivation.
